dialogueSection.text: Sully: This better be important, you've got 5 seconds before I hang up.
Det Carter: Sully, it's me, Carter.
Sully: Why the hell are you bothering me in the middle of the night Carter?
Det Carter: We need you back.
Sully: I'm a reckless drunk, remember. Why would you want me back?
Det Carter: There has been another killing, but there is something different about this killing. Almost like it was for a ritual...
Det Carter: ...plus the department is running short on manpower and you know this case better than anyone on the force.
Sully: I'm getting too old for this crap.
Det Carter: Dammit Frank! Get off your ass and get down here now!
Sully: Alright fine, I'll be there.
Sully: I've got a bad feeling about this.
